Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.google.code.play2-maven-plugin</groupId>
  <artifactId>play2-provider-api</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.0-alpha4</version>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'com.google.code.play2-maven-plugin:play2-provider-api:jar:1.0.0-alpha4'

Apache Ant

<dependency org="com.google.code.play2-maven-plugin" name="play2-provider-api" rev="1.0.0-alpha4">
  <artifact name="play2-provider-api" type="jar" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='com.google.code.play2-maven-plugin', module='play2-provider-api', version='1.0.0-alpha4')
)

Grails

compile 'com.google.code.play2-maven-plugin:play2-provider-api:1.0.0-alpha4'

Leiningen

[com.google.code.play2-maven-plugin/play2-provider-api "1.0.0-alpha4"]

SBT

libraryDependencies += "com.google.code.play2-maven-plugin" %% "play2-provider-api" % "1.0.0-alpha4"
